entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mildred Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 07:53 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 07:53 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 07:53 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 07:53 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 07:53 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 07:53 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 2. Forecast issued 07:53 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 07:53 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13. Forecast issued 07:53 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 07:53 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13. Forecast issued 07:53 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 07:53 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
